atmsystem

Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • atmsystem.Customer

  • public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
    The purpose of this class is to create Customer objects that hold info for use in the ATM network

    • Constructor Summary

                CashCard c,
                BankAccount account)
        The constructor for the customer object
        Parameters:
        a - This is an ATM and is used to verify account data along with the CashCard
        c - This is a CashCard and is used to verify account data along with the ATM
        account - a BankAccount to hold important data

        Returns:

      • verifyCashCard

        public boolean verifyCashCard(int number,
                              CashCard c)
        This method verifies the CashCard data input by the customer along with its expiration date
        Parameters:
        number - A number entered to check against entered CashCard's number
        c - The CashCard of the customer to verify
        Returns:
        verified if the entered data is correct and the card is valid

      • loginToAccount

        public boolean loginToAccount(java.util.Scanner sc,
                              CashCard c)
        This method's purpose is to verify customer data which is later needed to successfully withdraw
        Parameters:
        sc - The scanner to read in input
        c - The CashCard to verify
        Returns:

      • withdraw

        public void withdraw(java.util.Scanner sc)
        This methods verifies entered data and withdraws amount entered from an account
        Parameters:
        sc - The scanner object to read in data Precondition: The amount must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to the predefined limit for the ATM. All data must be verified to successfully withdraw Postcondition: The amount must be deducted from the account
